directions: Blend all ingredients with 1/2 teaspoon each of salt and pepper in a blender until smooth, then strain through a fine-mesh sieve into a large measuring cup, pressing on and then discarding solids. Pour into molds. Freeze 30 minutes. Insert sticks, then freeze until firm, about 24 hours.
ingredients: Equipment: 8 (1/3-cup) ice pop molds and 8 wooden sticks
title: Bloody Mary Ice Pops
